ResourceHeader.Description: Ground-based vector magnetic field at Igloolik, Nunavut, Canada, 0.5 s, MACCS Network, Higher latitude chain (Lat 69.3, Long 278.2). Station Code: IGLO.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Erik S. Steinmetz, Dr. Erik Steinmetz, MACCS, Augsburg College

InformationURL.Name: Augsburg College, Magnetometer for Cusp and Cleft Studies (MACCS) Magnetic Field Data Portal
InformationURL.Description: Main menu for access to magnetic field data

AccessURL.Name: CDAWeb FTP Access
AccessURL.Description: NASA/GSFC CDAWeb ftp access to the data.

AccessURL.Name: ASCII, CDF, and plots from CDAWeb
AccessURL.Description: Access to ASCII, CDF, and plots via NASA/GSFC CDAWeb

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Erik S. Steinmetz, Dr. Erik Steinmetz, MACCS, Augsburg College

NumericalData.Keyword: CDF Global Attribute DISCIPLINE: Space Physics>Magnetospheric Science
CDF Global Attribute DISCIPLINE: Space Physics>Ionospheric Science
CDF Global Attribute DATA_TYPE: MAG>Magnetic Field
CDF Global Attribute GENERATION_DATE: Mon Aug 8 16:04:59 2011
CDF Global Attribute MODS: Revision Dec 01 2008
CDF Global Attribute GENERATED_BY: THEMIS SOC
CDF Global Attribute RULES_OF_USE: Acknowledgement: Magnetometer data provided by: Dr. Erik Steinmetz, Augsburg College.

Parameter.Name: B in HDZ Components
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: thg_mag_iglo_epoch
Parameter.Description: Magnetic field B in HDZ vector components

Parameter.Name: H component of B
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: thg_mag_iglo_epoch
Parameter.Description: H component of the Magnetic Field Vector
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: thg_mag_iglo.

Parameter.Name: D component of B
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: thg_mag_iglo_epoch
Parameter.Description: D component of the Magnetic Field Vector
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: thg_mag_iglo.

Parameter.Name: Z component of B
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: thg_mag_iglo_epoch
Parameter.Description: Z component of the Magnetic Field Vector
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: thg_mag_iglo.

Parameter.Name: thg_mag_iglo_epoch
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function COMP_THEMIS_EPOCH with the following input parameters: thg_mag_iglo_epoch0, thg_mag_iglo_time.
